data.name: For The King Original Game Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Fahrul is in peril, the king is dead, but every adventurer needs some time by the campfire with a full pipe to relax, and what better way to relax than to listen to the wonderful Original Soundtrack to For The King

Enjoy these original 30 tracks, composed by John Robert Matz, anywhere you go; whether that be deep in a perilous dungeon, exploring the world of Fahrul, or diving deep in to the Frozen Expanse.

"For The King was an absolute joy to work on. Getting the chance to pull inspiration from some of my favorite eras of music history, and write a sprawling fantasy score around them was a dream come true. This was also a wonderful opportunity to stretch myself as a performer, and my studio is now cluttered with recorders, flutes, hand drums, dulcimers, and other assorted and sundry ancient and folk instruments as a result." - John Robert Matz.


Track List:

1 For The King
2 The Queen's Mission
3 The Guardian Forest
4 The Glittering Mines
5 A Dervish of a Skirmish
6 The Golden Plains
7 The King's Maze
8 Chaos Gathers
9 The Burning Forest
10 The Mage Dungeon
11 The Noble Sea
12 Temple of the Kraken
13 A Clash with Chaos
14 The Parched Waste
15 The Buried Temple
16 The Poison Bog
17 The Flooded Crypt
18 Nightfall
19 The Dropstone Badlands
20 In Volcanic Caverns
21 The Jungle Falls
22 Jungle Temple
23 The Frozen North
24 Snow Cave
25 The Tower Harazuel
26 Combat Most Dire
27 Endgame
28 Enshrined in Glory
29 Fahrul Calls (Early Access Launch Trailer)
30 Welcome to Fahrul (Launch Trailer)

data.short_description: Fill your pipe, sit back by the campfire and enjoy the sounds of Fahrul with the For The King Official Soundtrack
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4300 (2 * 1800) / AMD Athlon Dual Core 4450e (2 * 2300) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GTX (768 MB) / Intel HD 4600 / Radeon HD 3850 (512 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4570T (2* 2900) / AMD FX-6100 (6 * 3300) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti (2048 MB) / Radeon HD 7850 (2048 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OSX 10.10.5 Yosemite or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2520M (2 * 2500)
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 750M (1024 MB)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OSX 10.10.5 Yosemite or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 (4 * 3200)
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M390 (2048 MB)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 17.10 (x64) or Mint 18.3 (Cinnamon) (x64) or Ubuntu 16.04 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4300 (2 * 1800) / AMD Athlon Dual Core 4450e (2 * 2300) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GTX (768 MB) / Intel HD 4600 or equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 17.10 (x64) or Mint 18.3 (Cinnamon) (x64) or Ubuntu 16.04 (x64)
